lead_paragraph: Fox Sports announced its hiring of Rose as a studio analyst on Saturday, a move that a Fox Sports executive producer acknowledged the network should have explored years ago.

headline.print_headline: Looking to Shake Off Stigma, Rose Strikes at the Right Time
headline.main: Timing and Publicity Are Right as Pete Rose Looks to Shake Stigma

snippet: Fox Sports announced its hiring of Rose as a studio analyst on Saturday, a move that a Fox Sports executive producer acknowledged the network should have explored years ago.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column examines Fox Sports' decision to hire Pete Rose as a studio analyst, remarking that decision seems long overdue; observes that Rose's deep knowledge and charm will prove a strong asset to network; notes decision coincides with general revival of interest in Rose, who has applied to be reinstated to game under new MLB commissioner Rob Manfred.
